data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Goal kick for Gamba at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 1, Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 5, Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Urawa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Urawa.
In the minute 8, At Saitama Stadium 2002, Urawa are penalized for being offside.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Urawa's half?
In the minute 12, Urawa have a goal kick.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Yuya Fukuda is replacing Kosuke Onose for Gamba at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 27, Masaaki Toma awards Urawa a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Gamba pushes forward through Gen Shoji, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saitama.
Gamba's Hiroki Fujiharu breaks free at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Urawa goal kick.
In the minute 40, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Masaaki Toma awards the away team a throw-in.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Gamba.
In Saitama Gamba drive forward through Takashi Usami. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Masaaki Toma signals a Gamba throw-in in Urawa's half.
In the minute 44, Gamba are whistled for offside.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Urawa territory.
At Saitama Stadium 2002 the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Urawa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kazuki Nagasawa hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for Urawa in Saitama.
Attention is being given to Gambaâ€™s Hiroki Fujiharu and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 51, Can Urawa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Hiroki Fujiharu has recovered and rejoins the match in Saitama.
Throw-in for Urawa in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Urawa.
Patric's header is off-target for Gamba.
Urawa have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Leonardo for Urawa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Masaaki Toma awards Gamba a goal kick.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 60, Free kick Urawa.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saitama.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
In the minute 62, Goal! Urawa have got their heads in front thanks to a Tomoaki Makino strike.
That's a fine assist from Thomas Deng.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Gamba.
In the minute 66, Goal! Gamba go level at 1-1 through Takashi Usami in Saitama.
Gamba make their second substitution with Shuhei Kawasaki replacing Hiroki Fujiharu.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Shinzo Koroki with Kenyu Sugimoto. This is the first substitution made today by Tsuyoshi Otsuki.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Tsuyoshi Otsuki is making the team's second substitution at Saitama Stadium 2002 with Yuki Muto replacing Leonardo.
In Saitama Urawa's Yuki Muto is caught offside.
Shuhei Kawasaki gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gamba.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 75, Patric (Gamba) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
Throw-in for Urawa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 78, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Gamba's Ryu Takao is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Urawa in their own half.
Tomoya Ugajin is replacing Ryosuke Yamanaka for the home team.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Takashi Usami with Kazuma Watanabe.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a fourth substitution, with Kohei Okuno replacing Shinya Yajima.
The away team have replaced Shu Kurata with Shoji Toyama. This is the fifth substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Goal! A Ryu Takao header gives Gamba a 1-2 lead in Saitama.
In the minute 81, Yuki Yamamoto with an assist there.
In Saitama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Urawa.
In the minute 83, Masaaki Toma awards Gamba a goal kick.
Kazuma Watanabe of Gamba is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Urawa at Saitama Stadium 2002.
In the minute 85, Kosuke Taketomi is on a sub for Koya Yuruki for Urawa.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 88, Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Urawa in their own half.
Urawa have a dangerous throw-in.
Masaaki Toma will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Urawa have been awarded a corner by Masaaki Toma.
Masaaki Toma signals a Urawa throw-in in Gamba's half.
Urawa have a goal kick.
Kenyu Sugimoto for Urawa drives towards goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gamba's Kazuma Watanabe gets in a shot on goal at Saitama Stadium 2002. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Masaaki Toma signals a free kick to Urawa.
Masaaki Toma blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
